There’s already a thread for this.

What cool/interesting software features did you add this year? Technical Discussion
I know there was a thread on this already but that was a while ago and now the season is over. So, what cool software stuff did you add this year? Anything unique/specific to your team? Plans for next year? Stuff you tried to add but ran out of time?
